articles.title: Trial over killing of HIV activist begins in Greece - manilastandard.net
articles.description: Three years after a prominent Greek-American HIV activist was beaten to death in Athens, six people will appear in court on Wednesday in what Greeces LGBTQ community sees as an important trial for gay rights in the country.
articles.content:
posted October 20, 2021 at 01:30 pm
